nodes.text: The Ryndellia system was a star system located within the Ryndellian sector of the Mid Rim which contained the planet Ryndellia.

During the Clone Wars, the Malevolence attacked a convoy of Pelta-class frigates here. The Malevolence also staged an attack on the nearby Kaliida Shoals Medical Center, which was foiled by Anakin Skywalker and Shadow Squadron.
